data.event: In the 17th century its name changed to Mar Chico, meaning "small sea" and later as El Mar Menor.

event.title: the 1960s, when La Manga was discovered

data.event: As such, the space was untouched until the 1960s, when La Manga was discovered as a tourist resort and underwent a transformation which included the urbanisation of the area and the construction of tourist infrastructures.
